Source.Name: re2
Source.Summary: RE2 is a fast, safe, thread-friendly alternative to backtracking regular expression engines
Source.Description: RE2 is a fast, safe, thread-friendly alternative to backtracking regular expression engines like those used in PCRE, Perl, and Python. It is a C++ library.

Package.Name: re2
Package.Summary: RE2 is a fast, safe, thread-friendly alternative to backtracking regular expression engines
Package.Description: RE2 is a fast, safe, thread-friendly alternative to backtracking regular expression engines like those used in PCRE, Perl, and Python. It is a C++ library.
